verses.verse: We then<WG1161> that are strong<WG1415> ought<WG3784> to bear<WG941> the infirmities<WG771> of the weak,<WG102> and not to please<WG700> ourselves.<WG1438>
Let every<WG1538> one of us please<WG700> his neighbor<WG4139> for his good<WG18> to edification.<WG3619>
For even<WG2532> Christ<WG5547> pleased<WG700> not himself;<WG1438> but, as it is written,<WG1125> The reproaches<WG3679> of them that reproached<WG3679> you fell<WG1968> on<WG1909> me.

For whatever<WG3745> things were written<WG4270> aforetime<WG4270> were written<WG4270> for our learning,<WG1319> that we through<WG1223> patience<WG5281> and comfort<WG3874> of the scriptures<WG1124> might have<WG2192> hope.<WG1680>

Now<WG1161> the God<WG2316> of patience<WG5281> and consolation<WG3874> grant<WG1325> you to be like minded<WG3588> one<WG240> toward<WG1722> another<WG240> according<WG2596> to Christ<WG5547> Jesus:<WG2424>
That you may with one<WG3661> mind<WG3661> and one<WG1520> mouth<WG4750> glorify<WG1392> God,<WG2316> even<WG2532> the Father<WG3962> of our Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ.<WG5547>
Why<WG1352> receive<WG4355> you one<WG240> another,<WG240> as Christ<WG5547> also<WG2532> received<WG4355> us to the glory<WG1391> of God.<WG2316>

Now<WG1063> I say<WG3004> that Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> was a minister<WG1249> of the circumcision<WG4061> for the truth<WG225> of God,<WG2316> to confirm<WG950> the promises<WG1860> made to the fathers:<WG3962>

And that the Gentiles<WG1484> might glorify<WG1392> God<WG2316> for his mercy;<WG1656> as it is written,<WG1125> For this<WG5124> cause<WG1223> I will confess<WG1843> to you among<WG1722> the Gentiles,<WG1484> and sing<WG5567> to your name.<WG3686>
And again<WG3825> he said,<WG3004> Rejoice,<WG2165> you Gentiles,<WG1484> with his people.<WG2992>
And again,<WG3825> Praise<WG134> the Lord,<WG2962> all<WG3956> you Gentiles;<WG1484> and laud<WG1867> him, all<WG3956> you people.<WG2992>

And again,<WG3825> Esaias<WG2268> said,<WG3004> There shall be a root<WG4491> of Jesse,<WG2421> and he that shall rise<WG450> to reign<WG757> over the Gentiles;<WG1484> in him shall the Gentiles<WG1484> trust.<WG1679>

Now<WG1161> the God<WG2316> of hope<WG1680> fill<WG4137> you with all<WG3956> joy<WG5479> and peace<WG1515> in believing,<WG4100> that you may abound<WG4052> in hope,<WG1680> through<WG1722> the power<WG1411> of the Holy<WG40> Ghost.<WG4151>

And I myself also<WG2532> am persuaded<WG3982> of you, my brothers,<WG80> that you also<WG2532> are full<WG3324> of goodness,<WG19> filled<WG4137> with all<WG3956> knowledge,<WG1108> able<WG1410> also<WG2532> to admonish<WG3560> one<WG240> another.<WG240>

Nevertheless,<WG1161> brothers,<WG80> I have<WG2192> written<WG1125> the more<WG5112> boldly<WG5112> to you in some<WG575> <WG3313> sort,<WG3313> as putting<WG1878> you in mind,<WG1878> because<WG1223> of the grace<WG5485> that is given<WG1325> to me of God,<WG2316>

That I should be the minister<WG3011> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> to the Gentiles,<WG1484> ministering<WG2418> the gospel<WG2098> of God,<WG2316> that the offering<WG4376> up of the Gentiles<WG1484> might be acceptable,<WG2144> being sanctified<WG37> by the Holy<WG40> Ghost.<WG4151>
I have<WG2192> therefore<WG3767> whereof I may glory<WG2746> through<WG1722> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> in those<WG3588> things which pertain to God.<WG2316>

For I will not dare<WG5111> to speak<WG2980> of any<WG5100> of those things which<WG3739> Christ<WG5547> has not worked<WG2716> by me, to make<WG1519> the Gentiles<WG1484> obedient,<WG5218> by word<WG3056> and deed,<WG2041>

Through<WG1722> mighty<WG1411> signs<WG4592> and wonders,<WG5059> by the power<WG1411> of the Spirit<WG4151> of God;<WG2316> so<WG5620> that from Jerusalem,<WG2419> and round<WG2943> about<WG2945> to Illyricum,<WG2437> I have fully<WG4137> preached<WG4137> the gospel<WG2098> of Christ.<WG5547>

Yes,<WG235> so<WG3779> have I strived<WG5389> to preach<WG2097> the gospel,<WG2097> not where<WG3699> Christ<WG5547> was named,<WG3687> lest<WG2443> <WG3361> I should build<WG3618> on another<WG245> man's<WG245> foundation:<WG2310>
But as it is written,<WG1125> To whom<WG3739> he was not spoken<WG312> of, they shall see:<WG3700> and they that have not heard<WG191> shall understand.<WG4920>
For which<WG1352> cause<WG1352> also<WG2532> I have been much<WG5248> hindered<WG1465> from coming<WG2064> to you.

But now<WG3570> having<WG2192> no<WG3371> more<WG2001> place<WG5117> in these<WG5125> parts,<WG2824> and having<WG2192> a great<WG1974> desire<WG1974> these many<WG4183> years<WG2094> to come<WG2064> to you;

Whenever<WG5613> <WG1437> I take my journey<WG4198> into<WG1519> Spain,<WG4681> I will come<WG2064> to you: for I trust<WG1679> to see<WG2300> you in my journey,<WG1279> and to be brought<WG4311> on my way<WG4311> thitherward<WG1563> by you, if<WG1437> first<WG4412> I be somewhat<WG1705> filled<WG1705> with your<WG5216> company.
But now<WG3570> I go<WG4198> to Jerusalem<WG2419> to minister<WG1247> to the saints.<WG40>

For it has pleased<WG2106> them of Macedonia<WG3109> and Achaia<WG882> to make<WG4160> a certain<WG5100> contribution<WG2842> for the poor<WG4434> saints<WG40> which<WG3588> are at<WG1722> Jerusalem.<WG2419>

It has pleased<WG2106> them truly;<WG1063> and their debtors<WG3781> they are. For if<WG1487> the Gentiles<WG1484> have been made<WG2841> partakers<WG2841> of their spiritual<WG4152> things, their duty<WG3784> is also<WG2532> to minister<WG3008> to them in carnal<WG4559> things.
When therefore<WG3767> I have performed<WG2005> this,<WG5124> and have sealed<WG4972> to them this<WG5126> fruit,<WG2590> I will come<WG565> by you into<WG1519> Spain.<WG4681>
And I am sure<WG1492> that, when I come<WG2064> to you, I shall come<WG2064> in the fullness<WG4138> of the blessing<WG2129> of the gospel<WG2098> of Christ.<WG5547>

Now<WG1161> I beseech<WG3870> you, brothers,<WG80> for the Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ's<WG5547> sake, and for the love<WG26> of the Spirit,<WG4151> that you strive<WG4865> together<WG4865> with me in your<WG3588> prayers<WG4335> to God<WG2316> for me;

That I may be delivered<WG4506> from them that do not believe<WG544> in Judaea;<WG2449> and that my service<WG1248> which<WG3588> I have for Jerusalem<WG2419> may be accepted<WG2144> of the saints;<WG40>
That I may come<WG2064> to you with joy<WG5479> by the will<WG2307> of God,<WG2316> and may with you be refreshed.<WG4875>
Now<WG1161> the God<WG2316> of peace<WG1515> be with you all.<WG3956> Amen.<WG281>
